title: The Force of gravity
creator_credit: Lothar Wolff, McGraw-Hill Films and National Academy of Sciences (U.S.)
brief_description: Our attempt to understand gravitation, especially in its relation to cosmology and geophysics; the views of the Egyptians and the greeks, the later work of Copernicus, Kepler, Galileo and Newton and modern methods of studying and measuring gravity in different parts of the earth’s surface, with an explanation of the effect of the moon’s gravitational pull on the earth.
